inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis of the liver based on biopsy or clinical and radiographic criteria
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to provide informed consent (Grade 0 to 1 HE)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acute renal failure (increase in baseline creatinine of 0.5mg/dL to a value of >2.0 mg/dL within 3 days).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Absence of improvement in renal function after adequate fluid resuscitation using either normal saline or blood products (25% salt poor albumin, fresh frozen plasma, or packed red blood cells)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of sensitivity/allergy to lactulose or rifaximin or rifampin
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: doesn't smoke or use any illicit drugs

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease, experiences slowness of movement and tremors. He is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl which helps with shaking and slow movement.
